get.description: List all available Windows.ESU provider operations.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

schema.description: List of available REST API operations.

display.description: Meta data about operation used for display in portal.

nextLink.description: Link to the next page of resources.

get.description: List all Multiple Activation Keys (MAK) created for a subscription.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

id.description: Fully qualified resource ID for the resource. Ex - /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}

type.description: The type of the resource. E.g. "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines" or "Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts"

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

expirationDate.description: End of support of security updates activated by the MAK key.

osType.description: Type of OS for which the key is requested.

installedServerNumber.description: Number of activations/servers using the MAK key.

agreementNumber.description: Agreement number under which the key is requested.

isEligible.description: true if user has eligible on-premises Windows physical or virtual machines, and that the requested key will only be used in their organization; false otherwise.

nextLink.description: Link to the next page of resources.

get.description: List all Multiple Activation Keys (MAK) in a resource group.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

id.description: Fully qualified resource ID for the resource. Ex - /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}

type.description: The type of the resource. E.g. "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines" or "Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts"

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

expirationDate.description: End of support of security updates activated by the MAK key.

osType.description: Type of OS for which the key is requested.

installedServerNumber.description: Number of activations/servers using the MAK key.

agreementNumber.description: Agreement number under which the key is requested.

isEligible.description: true if user has eligible on-premises Windows physical or virtual machines, and that the requested key will only be used in their organization; false otherwise.
